Room.Name: West Hall
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the western hall of the Castle Kayleigh.
Room.LongDescription: This is the hall of nobility, which leads to the private quarters of long dead royalty. The scorched hallway is a sad reminder of glorious days of past ages. After the Witch made this her home, she brought in pigs to keep in the royal bedchambers, as an insult to the family. Now, there are pig skeletons littering the floor.
